div.div:
Parents of North Hopkins ISD,
Though we are apart right now for our health and safety, we at North Hopkins ISD continue to support each other as a community, and right now we must work together . . .

img.alt: Encouragement from Dr. Darin Jolly, Superintendent

div.h3: Encouragement from Dr. Darin Jolly, Superintendent
div.div:
Panthers,
We miss you so much during this time of closure. When we dismissed for spring break, I had no idea that we would not be back together by now. I cannot even begin to tell you how much I . . .

div.class: custom_49605 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

td.p: Our Vision: NHISD will be dedicated to excellence in education that leads to successful learners and prepares them to be valued citizens, prepared for the challenges of today and tomorrow’s world.

Our Mission Statement: North Hopkins ISD shall provide the highest quality instruction, instructional staff and facilities to ensure that every student is equipped to his/her greatest academic potential. North Hopkins ISD also intends to help graduate a responsible people of high moral character, capable of personal and professional success, who shall have a positive impact on society.

North Hopkins ISD does not discriminate on the basis of sex, ethnicity, race, color, age, or national origin in its educational programs or employment as required by Title IX, Section 504, and Title VI

p.a: Public Notification of Nondiscrimination in Career and Technical Education* Programs
